item.description:
The Revolve Nation's Boston Entrepreneurs Network is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more!

Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Wine and snacks provided!

Schedule:

6pm-6:30pm  -- Open Networking over wine and snacks

6:30-7:45pm  -- Presentation from Exemplar Capital on methods of financing a business with their relative pros and cons, with Q&A

7:45-8:00pm  -- Wrap up networking

Presenter:

As the Head of Investment Banking for Exemplar Capital, Bagus Tjahjono focuses on providing a select group of clients with solutions to complex financial problems. 

Bagus has advised companies ranging from start-ups to mature/stable companies on transactions spanning the following areas: 

  • Mergers & Acquisitions 
  • Commercial Real Estate Financing Strategies 
  • Turnaround Situations
  • Business Development 
  • Debt and Equity Financing 
  • Operational and Management Issues

Bagus has experience working with companies in the financial services, technology, healthcare, hospitality, food services and real estate industries.

SPONSORS: Revolve, Inc.: www.revolvethis.com

Exemplar Law: www.exemplarcompanies.com

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: Be sure to use the 100 Milk St entrance and then take the elevator to the 8th floor. Ring the doorbell at the glass double doors and we'll let you in.
item.name: Special Presentation: Loans, Investments, & Financing a Business
